properties.title: Cabane des Diablerets CAS
properties.description: Traditional, small SAC mountain guesthouse at the foot of TÃªte aux Chamois, the intermediate station of the Glacier 3000 cable-car to the glacier plateau of Les Diablerets. The attractions of this place above Col du Pillon include the variety of climbing and hiking tours as well as the climbing parks nearby. The simple, characteristic cabin can be used for training courses, schools and clubs in winter and summer. In winter there is skiing on ski pistes and alpine ascents.
